channel.title: Kotlin on Sid Patil - Android Engineer and Kotlin Advocate
channel.description: Recent content in Kotlin on Sid Patil - Android Engineer and Kotlin Advocate

item.title: Build Function Chains Using Composition in Kotlin
item.description: We are going to focus on how we can use functions to alter the nature of an object and change it, and how we can chain functions together to apply their effects on an object in one go with a composite pattern.
